org.apache.streams.config

Class ComponentConfigurator<T extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.config.ComponentConfigurator<T>

  • public class ComponentConfigurator<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
    ComponentConfigurator supplies serializable configuration beans derived from a specified typesafe path or object.

    Typically a component will select a 'default' typesafe path to be used if no other path or object is provided.

    For example, streams-persist-elasticsearch will use 'elasticsearch' by default, but an implementation such as github.com/apache/streams-examples/local/elasticsearch-reindex can resolve a reader from elasticsearch.source and a writer from elasticsearch.destination.

    • Method Detail

      • detectConfiguration

        public T detectConfiguration()
        resolve a serializable configuration pojo. the entire object, or fragments of it, will be collected and merged from: - the simple class name of the configured class - the fully qualified class name of the configured class - any of the ancestor classes of the configured class - the configured class's package - any of the parent packages of the configured class's package
        Returns:
        result

      • detectConfiguration

        Returns:
        result
